column1: Little Goat Diner////Even though Little Goat is known as the sufficient alternative for the Girl and the Goat
column2: I'd say that this fashionable and modern diner can hold its own. I made a reservation through Open Table for a meeting with a friend
column3: and we were seated promptly at a large and very comfortable booth on the perimeter of the room with a window to the outside. My only complaint with that
column4: which is also my only complaint for the experience itself
column5: was that the sun was coming in at the time and blinding us so we had to draw the blinds ourselves - no big deal. The waiters were very attentive and refilled my water each time I guzzled it down. They were also very knowledgable about the menu and answered any questions and accommodated any special food requests that my friend and I had.
